reviewText: Shop around and you will see this set generally sells for around $32. Any one of the movies easily sells for $9.99. The movies themselves are all great. "Home Alone" most people are familiar with Macauley Caulkin causing havoc on burglars. In "Jingle All the Way", Arnold Schwarzenegger goes nuts trying to buy a kid a hot new toy. George C. Scott is excellent as Ebenezer Scrooge in another version of "A Christmas Carol". The remake of "Miracle on 34th Street" is good as well. I had two of these but for this price I bought the set so I could get the other two and then give two away or donate two to a good cause.
Title: Christmas Classics Boxed Set: (Miracle on 34th Street / Jingle All the Way / Home Alone / A Christmas Carol)

reviewText: I was so happy to see all of my favorite Christmas classics in one set for a great price! Would have preferred plastic cases though over the paper/cardboard.
Title: Christmas Classics Boxed Set: (Miracle on 34th Street / Jingle All the Way / Home Alone / A Christmas Carol)

reviewText: Great condition. Prompt service. Wonderful price. We will really enjoy these DVD editions when Christmas rolls around again. (DVD takes up so much less room than our old clunky VHS versions!)
summary: Great addition to the holiday collection on DVD
Title: Christmas Classics Boxed Set: (Miracle on 34th Street / Jingle All the Way / Home Alone / A Christmas Carol)

reviewText: I bought this for my ex for Christmas and he loved it. Can't beat the price for a 4 in 1 movie.
Title: Christmas Classics Boxed Set: (Miracle on 34th Street / Jingle All the Way / Home Alone / A Christmas Carol)

reviewText: we loved these movies. we purchased them for a women's dorm video library and they are used every Christmas season.
Title: Christmas Classics Boxed Set: (Miracle on 34th Street / Jingle All the Way / Home Alone / A Christmas Carol)

reviewText: These are wonderful movies which are also appropriate for older children.  Jingle All The Way must be one of Arnold's worst flicks, but younger kids seemed to enjoy it.  A Christmas Carol I don't suggest for the little ones, plot and themes are just a bit beyond thier grasp. Overall there is something for everyone, so I do recommend this 4-for-1 bargain.
Title: Christmas Classics Boxed Set: (Miracle on 34th Street / Jingle All the Way / Home Alone / A Christmas Carol)

reviewText: Three of the 4 videos were great. You won't be disappointed. I always enjoyed the original Miracle on 34th street and was glad that I could own the new updated version.
Title: Christmas Classics Boxed Set: (Miracle on 34th Street / Jingle All the Way / Home Alone / A Christmas Carol)

reviewText: All 4 of these movies are great for the whole family to watch!  And, for some reason we don't tire of them!  :)
Title: Christmas Classics Boxed Set: (Miracle on 34th Street / Jingle All the Way / Home Alone / A Christmas Carol)

reviewText: 4 great movies at a super low price.  I have been wanting Home Alone for some time now and even to purchase that at the cheapest this past Christmas it was $9.99.  My entire family enjoyed watching Home Alone along with some other Christmas fav's with this box set!
Title: Christmas Classics Boxed Set: (Miracle on 34th Street / Jingle All the Way / Home Alone / A Christmas Carol)

reviewText: I like the bundle thing that it provides while I cook Christmans dinner I can watch this DVD. Very good product.
Title: Christmas Classics Boxed Set: (Miracle on 34th Street / Jingle All the Way / Home Alone / A Christmas Carol)

reviewText: I love all of these movies.  They are all classics and this a very great value to get all four of them in one set.  You can't go wrong!
summary: All great movaies in this Classis set!
Title: Christmas Classics Boxed Set: (Miracle on 34th Street / Jingle All the Way / Home Alone / A Christmas Carol)

reviewText: The product was in perfect condition & arrived quickly. I'm completely satisfied with the service I got.
Title: Christmas Classics Boxed Set: (Miracle on 34th Street / Jingle All the Way / Home Alone / A Christmas Carol)

reviewText: Nice selection of some truly heart-warming holiday films that will not only give you a chuckle but also take you back with a couple of classics.  Miracle on 34th Street is a classic and a holiday must and has been around since films first came out.  Well worth the money for so much 'feel-good' in four wonderfully enjoyable movies that is good for all members of the family, young and old alike.  They make you wanna put up the tree and hang the stockings!
summary: Wonderful DVD holiday collection which will easily get you into the Christmas spirit.
Title: Christmas Classics Boxed Set: (Miracle on 34th Street / Jingle All the Way / Home Alone / A Christmas Carol)

reviewText: I enjoy all of these movies and I enjoy watching them.  They are a very good addition to my library.
Title: Christmas Classics Boxed Set: (Miracle on 34th Street / Jingle All the Way / Home Alone / A Christmas Carol)
